# Problem 1

```{r}
aux = 0
for(i in 1:999) {
  if(i %% 3 == 0 || i %% 5 == 0) {
    aux = aux + i
  }
}
```

# Problem 2

```{r}
seq <- c(1,2)
i = 3
repeat {
  seq[i] <- seq[i-1] + seq[i - 2]
  if(seq[i] >= 4000000){
    break
  }
  i = i + 1
}
sum(seq[seq < 4000000 & seq %% 2 == 0])
```

# Problem 3

```{r}
num <- 600851475143
fatores <- c()

s <- 3
while (s^2 <= num) {
  while (num %% s == 0) {
    fatores <- c(fatores, s)
    num <- num / s
  }
  s <- s + 2
}

if (num > 2) {
  fatores <- c(fatores, num)
}
```

# Problem 4

```{r}
p <- c()
for (i in 100:999){
  for (j in 100:999){
    num <- i * j
    b <- strsplit(as.character(num), NULL)[[1]]
    a <- rev(strsplit(as.character(num), NULL)[[1]])
    if(all(a == b)){
      p <- c(p, num)
      print(num)
    }
  }
}
max(p)
```

# Problem 5

```{r}
s <- 20
repeat {
  if(all(s %% c(1:20) == 0)) {
    break
  }
  s <- s + 20
}
```

sum(1:100)^2 - sum(c(1:100)^2)

# Problem 7

```{r}
primo <- c(2)
s <- 3
repeat {
  if(all(s %% 2:(floor(sqrt(s))+1) != 0)) {
    primo <- c(primo,s)
    if(length(primo) == 10001) break
  }
  s <- s + 1
}
```

# Problem 8

```{r}

numero <- ""
digitos <- as.numeric(strsplit(numero, NULL)[[1]])
results <- c()
for(i in 1:(length(digitos)-12)) {
  results <- c(results, prod(digitos[c(i:(i+12))]))
}

```

# Problem 9

```{r}
for (a in 1:999) {
  for (b in (a+1):(1000 - a - 1)) {
    c <- 1000 - a - b
    if (a^2 + b^2 == c^2) {
      cat("a =", a, "b =", b, "c =", c, "\n")
      cat("Produto abc =", a * b * c, "\n")
      break
    }
  }
}

```
